content.text: Look at the reading and pay attention to the details.
content.name: hSrJ

content.class: bg-slate-100 rounded p-3 my-2 max-w-3xl mx-auto

content.text: When I was younger, I remember I went to my first big concert. This took place in a more popular place than the concerts I have been to until that moment. It was quite impressive to see how many people were actually there.
content.name: wtpk

content.text: It was the moment the band came to the stage when fans got crazier than before. They were obviously noisier; everyone was more excited now the wait has finished. The way they played their songs was more amazing than I had imagined.
content.name: d6K1

content.text: Back then, the band was newer than most bands. Nowadays, the band is still together and their concert tickets are more expensive. This is because their show is longer (duration). You can tell it is also more colorful. They now use more props, which include a lot of lights and “jewelry” made of led lights.
content.name: 24PX

content.text: My predictions are that in a few years, the band members will be older but they will also be wiser. Their experiences throughout the years will make their concerts even better than they are now. Of course, their tickets will not get cheaper, but they will be worth it. Their shows will be more fun and fans will be more excited, more surprised and happier every time they get the opportunity to see them playing.
content.name: jiHa
4Cs6
